name: European Biostimulants Industry Council
goal: The European Biostimulant Industry Council (EBIC) promotes the contribution of plant biostimulants to make agriculture more sustainable and resilient and in doing so promotes the growth and development of the European Biostimulant Industry. EBIC was founded in June 2011 as the European Biostimulant Industry Consortium and changed its named when it gained legal identity in 2013.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Environment, Food Safety, Internal Market, Research and Technology
